author: wolstaeb
title: DeFi+Catalyst🔥 Retroactive Finance
description: To rapidly fund Catalyst teams with new financing models built on risk-adjusted bonding curves, we need a user experience people understand.
solution: Conduct user research with behavioural data to design and prototype a mobile app that turns people into impact investors.
experience: Product and UX Design of point-of-sale, accounting and ERP systems. Impact investing and financial markets software engineering.
